ssot__ContactPointAddress__dlm.name: Contact Point Address
ssot__ContactPointAddress__dlm.description: The Contact Point Address DMO represents the mailing address of a party.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date from which the contact’s address is active.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the contact’s address becomes inactive.

ssot__AddressLineId__c.description: A reference ID for the contact’s address.

ssot__AddressLine1__c.description: The first line of the address, including the street name and number.

ssot__AddressLine2__c.description: The second line of an address, for example, a suite number.

ssot__AddressLine3__c.description: The third line of an address.

ssot__AddressLine4__c.description: The fourth line of an address.

ssot__BestTimeToContactEndTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to stop receiving communication.

ssot__BestTimeToContactStartTime__c.description: A contact’s preferred date and time to start receiving communication.

ssot__BestTimeToContactTimezoneId__.description: A reference ID to the contact’s preferred time zone.

ssot__CityId__c.description: The reference ID of a city, town, or village.

ssot__CityName__c.description: The name of a city, town, or village.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the contact point address DMO.

ssot__ContactPointTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact type.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: The reference ID of the country where the address is located.

ssot__CountryName__c.description: The country where the address is located.

ssot__CountryRegionId__c.description: A reference ID for the country or region where the address is located.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, for example, a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__ForBusinessUse__c.description: Whether the address is for business use.

ssot__ForPersonalUse__c.description: Whether the address is for personal use.

ssot__GeoAccuracy__c.description: Additional information about an address’ latitude and longitude.

ssot__GeocodeAccuracyType__c.description: The geographic code accuracy type for the contact point.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID for the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsUsedForBilling__c.description: Whether the address is the contact’s billing address.

ssot__IsUsedForMailing__c.description: Whether the contact point address can be used for mailing.

ssot__IsUsedForShipping__c.description: Whether the address is the contact’s shipping address.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group. This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PhysicalLocationId__c.description: A reference ID to the physical location of the address.

ssot__PostalCodeId__c.description: The reference ID for the postal code.

ssot__PreferenceRankNumber__c.description: The preference rank number for the contact point address.

ssot__ContactPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the primary phone number for this address.

ssot__PrimaryFlag__c.description: Indicates whether the address is the primary address of the individual or account.

ssot__ProfileFirstCreatedDate___c.description: The date the profile was created.

ssot__ProfileLastUpdatedDate__c.description: The date the profile was last updated.

ssot__ProfileOccurrenceCount__c.description: The number of occurrences of the profile for the contact point address.

ssot__StateProvinceId__c.description: The reference ID for the state or province where the address is located.

ssot__StateProvinceName__c.description: The state or province where the address is located.

ssot__TimezoneCode__c.description: A single-character code indicating the time zone’s relationship to Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

ssot__UsageType__c.description: The usage type for the contact point address.
